Antrean Panjang BBM di Kaltim, DPRD Bakal Panggil Pertamina
01 Nov 2019, 12:49 by Siti Khairiyah


Antrean Panjang BBM di Kaltim, DPRD Bakal Panggil Pertamina

KBRN, Samarinda: DPRD Kalimantan Timur akan  memanggil Pertamina, lantaran banyaknya aduan warga mengenai antrean BBM yang terjadi disepanjang SPBU yang ada di Kalimantan Timur termasuk Samarinda.
Hal itu disampaikan anggota DPRD Kaltim Rusman Yaqub kepada RRI di Samarinda, jum,at siang (1/11/2019), terkait langkanya BBM di Samarinda.
Rusmas mengatakan, dalam pertemuan nanti, para anggota Dewanakan menayakan kelanggan BBM yang menyebabkan antrian panjang terjadi di sejumlah SPBU seperti SPBU jalan PM. Noor, SPBU sempaja,  SPBU Kadri Uning.
"Secara permanen tidak pernah menyelesaikan masalah BBM ini selalu saja munculn tetapi dibandingkan Pulau Jawa dan Sulawesi tidak pernah ada antrian seperti ini, menurut saya DPRD Harus Bertindak Tegas dengan memanggil Pertamina untuk menyelesaikan masalah ini,” kata Rusman 
Dengan diadakannya pertamuan antara DPRD, Dinas /Instansi terkait dan Pertamina, akan tau duduk persoalannya apakah kuota BBM di beberpaa SPBU di Samarinda dikurangi atau ada hal lain.
“Bahkan ada SPBU yang tutup pada sore hari di Samairnda karena kehabisan Stok BBK baik jenis premium, pertalite, pertamax  dan solar,” tegasnya.

Long fuel lines in East Kalimantan, DPRD will call Pertamina
Nov 1, 2019, 12:49 by Siti Khairiyah


Long fuel lines in East Kalimantan, DPRD will call Pertamina

KBRN, Samarinda: The DPRD of East Kalimantan will call on Pertamina, because there are many complaints from residents about the fuel lines that occur along the gas stations in East Kalimantan, including Samarinda.
This was said by East Kalimantan DPRD member Rusman Yaqub to RRI in Samarinda, Friday, at noon (1/11/2019), regarding the scarcity of fuel in Samarinda.
Rusmas said, in a later meeting, the members of the Council would ask for fuel subsidies which caused long queues to occur at a number of gas stations such as the PM road gas station. Noor, perfect gas station, Kadri Uning gas station.
"Permanently never resolving this fuel problem always appears, but compared to Java and Sulawesi there has never been a queue like this, in my opinion the DPRD must act decisively by calling Pertamina to resolve this problem," said Rusman
With the holding of a meeting between the DPRD, the relevant Service / Institution and Pertamina, the problem will be whether the fuel quota in several gas stations in Samarinda is reduced or there are other things.
"There is even a gas station that closes in the afternoon in Samairnda because it runs out of stock BBK both premium types, pertalite, Pertamax and diesel," he said.
